text: @HillaryClinton His excuse was pure b******* as to why people should do absentee voting. I live in MI. and sometimes we have bad weather in November. I think that's reason enough to do a absentee vote, so does my 82 year old mama. And especially now with a coronavirus 19. Trump can't bully me!
